text: Jack Sock was the defending champion, but lost in the second round to Reilly Opelka. Frances Tiafoe won his first ATP World Tour title, defeating Peter Gojowczyk in the final, 6–1, 6–4. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ===Bottom half=== ==Qualifying== ===Seeds=== ===Qualifiers=== ===Lucky losers=== ===Qualifying draw=== ====First qualifier==== ====Second qualifier==== ====Third qualifier==== ====Fourth qualifier==== ==References== * Main draw * Qualifying draw Delray Beach Open - Singles 2018 Singles
title: 2018 Delray Beach Open – Singles
